pr_title: SAK-44306: Error on log when trying to upload file with no file selected

timeline.message: SAK-44306: Error on log when trying to upload file with no file selected

timeline.body: log.warn("Failed to get upload part from request, NULL will be returned, {}", e.toString());
timeline.bodyText: log.warn("Failed to get upload part from request, NULL will be returned, {}", e.toString());
timeline.bodyHTML: log.warn("Failed to get upload part from request, NULL will be returned, {}", e.toString());
timeline.author: ern

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
log.debug("Failed to get upload part from request. Null will be returned.", e);
log.warn("Failed to get upload part from request, NULL will be returned, {}", e.toString());
timeline.author: ern
